p: Although we understand the point being raised, combining Figure 1F, G with Figure 2 will result in a very large figure with reduced overall readability and interpretation. Moreover, Figure 1F and G are also closely linked to Figure 1C and D. To improve the overall interpretation of both figures and the link between them we added at the end of Figure legend 1 the following sentence: The colour coding of the individual VHHs is based on the outcome of the competition ELISA result as presented in Figure 2A and 2B.
